website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic LightStream PJD5555W projector offers solid data- and video-image quality, and the ability to project 3D content, at a modest price.
pros: Good brightness for a budget projector
Good video quality for a DLP model
cons: Some tinting and rainbow artifacts in video

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product  Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice so far. Once for a business presentation (.xls and .ppt) and a few days later, videos at a wedding. Very pleased on all counts and can't recommend this highly enough! Sharp, bright image...easy hookup and operation, great price. I've done a lot of presentations on a lot of crappy projectors over the years. I wish I bought one of these a lot sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Airplane DriverTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Consider the heat / humidity.....
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this projector leaves a little to be desired. Ordered two to take to a school in Uganda. Both were very sensitive to heat/humidity. One would overheat (?) within 20-30 minutes and shut down for a short period. The other did the same, but would not come back on until all heat had dissipated in the case. I still need to send a replacement to Uganda, but will not use this model again. Consider the final destination, as there are places in the US that would match the weather in Uganda. North Pole? No problem.
customer_reviews.author: D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great job
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about a year, setting it up for a weekly Sunday School class in a classroom that was naturally bright from outside sunlight -- no problem. Moved to another classroom and ceiling mounted the projector and attached a MS wireless adapter. Bright, sound is okay (mono), loud enough for young and older adults to hear. If sound quality is a necessity, attach external speakers. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Plain 'Ole Pop

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Got this projector to use for our outdoor movie screen. It projects an excellent quality picture on a 16'x9' screen with ease. The built-in speaker is grossly under powered for our purpose, but we planned on that so it certainly is not a deal breaker. We have played DVDs, Blu Ray, and streamed content through this from Planet Earth to sporting events and all of them look fantastic. I would say that I would buy this again, but I don't plan on ever having to do so. Highly recommend this projector!
customer_reviews.author: CBeck09

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value at this price point
customer_reviews.text: I chose this based on a careful reading of other user reviews for a number of different products. I have to give fellow Amazon customers a lot of credit for their well researched and helpful advice. I've been using the ViewSonic PJD5555W for about two months, and for a first time home theater projector, I've found it to be an excellent value for the price. The picture is bright and sharp and the colors are true. Despite the company's advertising, the unit's internal speaker is nothing special. But hooked up to good external speakers the audio is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Great color, brightness and sharpness
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert in these, but the picture quality is superb, the colors are super vivid and when a show comes on where the screen turns nearly all white, I almost have to squint my eyes! So brightness is amazing. We mounted it upside down on the ceiling and are shooting against a white wall from about 8 feet away. I like that it even has a premium sounding audio speaker built-in, in case you don't have external speakers hooked up. Most of the 5 star reviews I completely agree with.
customer_reviews.author: inkratas

customer_reviews.title: Two and a half years later still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this projector for presentations at conference around the country in May 2017. It's November 2019 and I used it again just two weeks ago and it it still going strong. Easy to operate with a clear and bright picture, this device has been on many a plane ride, carried through many an airport, and in and out of car trunks repeatedly. It's not a short-throw projector, but it's not a long-throw either, though, so I recommend a nice long HDMI cord.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Nimity

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier! Do note that this projector has a non-standard ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector after a lot of research. Couldn't be happier! Do note that this projector has a non-standard throw ratio, which makes pictures look smaller than most projectors for the same distance. This was exactly what I wanted so I ended up with a perfectly sized picture in my living room. If the characteristics of this projector fit your room, then it's really a good option. I connect it to my Amazon Fire TV stick and then use the audio output jack to feed a Bluetooth transmitter and then connect my Bose speakers. Really powerful combo! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GFC

customer_reviews.title: Best projector I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I simply cannot put into words how great this projector is. WE LOVE IT!!!. We have a very bright living room and this projector just simply blows our mind even with sun shining on the screen. However, at night with lights down low, the colors and clarity are simply incredible. I did by the two year warranty since our last ViewSonic would not stay on after 5 mins. I hope this one lasts longer and keeps this great picture. We use about 8 hours a day and after 3 months it looks as good as the day we purchased.

Recommend this as a viable option for anyone looking to have a decent projector at a great price!

product_meta.description: Style:WXGA (2017)The ViewSonic LightStream PJD5555w price-performance projector features 3200 lumens, native WXGA 1280x800 resolution, and intuitive, user-friendly design. Exclusive SuperColorTM technology offers a wider color range for true-to-life image projection, while sound enhancement technology delivers improved sound quality. The PJD5555w also features extensive connectivity including HDMI, 2 x VGA, Composite Video, S-Video, 1 x VGA output and Audio in/out. An energy-saving DynamicEco feature reduces power consumption by up to 70%, and extends the lamp life by up to 10,000 hours. With advanced audiovisual features, flexible connectivity options, and an affordable price, the PJD5555w is ideal for use in education and small business environments.
